buildCommand: curl -o flutter.tar.xz https://storage.googleapis.com/flutter_infra_release/releases/stable/linux/flutter_linux_3.24.5-stable.tar.xz && tar xf flutter.tar.xz && export PATH="$PATH:`pwd`/flutter/bin" && flutter doctor && flutter pub get && flutter build web && sed -i "s/%SUPABASE_URL%/$SUPABASE_URL/g" build/web/index.html && sed -i "s/%SUPABASE_ANON_KEY%/$SUPABASE_ANON_KEY/g" build/web/index.html
installCommand: echo 'Flutter will be installed during build'
